Debt as intergenerational corruption https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
Corruption comes from the Latin corruptio, which is the degradation of something by perversion or putrefaction of its totality. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
In the present, nobody does it better than neoliberalism as the totalitarian regime that it is. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
The robbery of some official is just a minor lure to distract. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
Neoliberalism corrupts everything. Until the western legal tradition. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
It refers to an obligation as the creditor-debtor link, where the debtor has the right to demand a benefit from the debtor.
When this obligation comes from a bond called a contract, it requires that the debtor has expressed his will to be bound.
For example, when a loan contract is signed, it is being forced (to the debtors) https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
to return to the lender (creditor) in the future the capital that was loaned. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
A subject can not subscribe to a creditor a contract for another third party to pay https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
if that third party does not want to incur any debt nor was he owing anything to anyone. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
It would be like forcing someone to pay with their credit card purchases that another enjoys. Https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
These days, the Ministry of Finance has led a legal milestone.
It has constituted in favor of external creditors the right to charge not only to third parties, but also to people who have not yet been born.
With the issuance of a 100-year bond at 7.9 percent interest, the government (which complains of the heavy inheritance) ...
... forces the next 25 presidencies that will succeed him to return tomorrow what he enjoys today. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
The corruption of neoliberalism is this. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
Perversion of the institutions, where a minister impersonates the Congress and the Judiciary is silent. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
Putrefaction of values, where a public servant is a gnocchi, a master a loafer, https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
... a compatriot with different abilities a scammer. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
And indebting our choznos, an achievement that shows the confidence that the world has for us. https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
We understand it opportune to produce a manifesto where academic institutions and others of civil society https://t.co/RAAtWM9CQJ
reliably notify transnational banks that promote these debt bonds, the economic unsustainability of their payment in the future
And the illegality of its issuance to the present. So these banks can not claim tomorrow ignorance of moral risk.
Something that will be important to defend the interests of our country at the moment that this debt can not be paid and must be restructured.
